perk.name: Master Archer
perk.description_key: Each level in perk raises your damage with bows and crossbows.

perk.name: Gun Pistol
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a pistol.

perk.name: Gun Magnum
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a 44 Magnum.

perk.name: Gun Hunting Rifle
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a hunting rifle.

perk.name: Gun Sniper Rifle
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a sniper rifle.

perk.name: Gun Shotgun
perk.description_key: Learn how to assembly a shotgun.

perk.name: Gun AK47
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble an AK47 Rifle.

perk.name: Gun Rocket
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a rocket launcher.

perk.name: Gun SMG
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a SMG.

perk.name: Plumbing
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft plumbing kits to repair sinks for a clean source of drinking water.

perk.name: Oven Repair
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft Oven Repair kits to repair ovens for cooking without needing fuel.

perk.name: Lockpicks
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to make lockpicks to unlock gun safes. Doesn't work on doors.

perk.name: Pottery
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learning pottery can teach you how to craft clay bowls, plates and clay Amphora which are all essential for cooking recipes.

perk.name: Chainsaw
perk.description_key: Purchase this perk to learn how to assemble a chainsaw.

perk.name: Auger
perk.description_key: Purchase this perk to learn how to assemble an Auger.

perk.name: Minibike
perk.description_key: Purchase this perk to learn how to assemble together a minibike.

perk.name: Crossbow
perk.description_key: Purchase this perk to learn how to craft crossbows and bolts. Level 2 unlocks iron crossbows.Level 3 unlocks crossbow repeater.

perk.name: Compound Bow
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a Compound Bow.

perk.name: Nailgun
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a Nailgun.

perk.name: Advance Traps
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft stronger trap recipes such as trussing, steel and fire traps.

perk.name: Spiked Club
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a spiked club.

perk.name: Sledgehammer
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a sledgehammer.

perk.name: Hunting Knife
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a hunting knife.

perk.name: First Aid Kit
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft first aid kits.

perk.name: Herbal Antibiotics
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft herbal antibiotics.

perk.name: Gas Can
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft gasoline used for items such as chainsaws, augers or minibikes.

perk.name: Flaming Arrows
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft flaming arrows.

perk.name: Explosive Bolts
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft exploding crossbow bolts.

perk.name: Iron Helmet
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft an iron Helmet.

perk.name: Iron Chest Armor
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft an iron chestplate.

perk.name: Iron Leg Armor
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft iron leg armor.

perk.name: Iron Boots
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft iron boots.

perk.name: Iron Gloves
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft iron gloves.

perk.name: Scrap Iron Helmet
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a scrap iron Helmet.

perk.name: Scrap Iron Chest Armor
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a scrap iron chestplate.

perk.name: Scrap Iron Leg Armor
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft scrap iron leg armor.

perk.name: Scrap Iron Boots
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft scrap iron boots.

perk.name: Scrap Iron Gloves
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft scrap iron gloves.

perk.name: Leather Hood
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft an Leather hood.

perk.name: Leather Chest Armor
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft Leather chest armor.

perk.name: Leather Leg Armor
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft Leather leg armor.

perk.name: Leather Boots
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft Leather boots.

perk.name: Leather Gloves
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft Leather gloves.

perk.name: Skinning Knife
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a skinning knife. These knives are useful for getting extra hides from skinning animals.

perk.name: Butcher Knife
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a butcher knife. These knives are useful for getting extra meat from animals.

perk.name: Super Chef
perk.description_key: Learn how to cook superior recipes.
